abstract: Presents Lady Knollys with ambulances for Brit Red Cross; por
snippet: Eight ambulances, bought with funds given to the British War Relief Society, were presented yesterday to the British Red Cross in a ceremony in front of the WaldorfAstoria Hotel....

headline.main: 8 AMBULANCES GIVEN TO BRITISH RED CROSS; Lady Knollys Accepts Vehicles at Ceremony Here

lead_paragraph: Eight ambulances, bought with funds given to the British War Relief Society, were presented yesterday to the British Red Cross in a ceremony in front of the WaldorfAstoria Hotel.
